Package servlets

  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    Accueil  
    addAChoice
    Servlet To handle the use case : adding a choice to a paragraph
    AutoriserAcces
    servlet to manage the configuration of the editing rights of a story a user can turn through this his stories public for editing or over an invitation
    Connexion
    allows the user to log in after a verification in the data base
    Creation
    To handle the creation of a new story
    Edit
    To handle the display if the stories that can be edited by the logged in user
    EditParagraph
    servlet that handles the display of paragraphs in editing mode giving the id of the associated choice
    EditStory
    Servlet that handles the display of a story in editing mode, it displays in fact the story information and its first paragraph and its choices
    EspacePersonnel
    servlet that handle display of the stories owned by the logged in user also as the choice he's currently writing
    Inscription
    servlet that handles the sign up
    LogOut
    for the user to log out
    ModifierParagraph
    Servlet that handle a validated paragraph's modification
    Publier
    servlet that handle the changing of the story's status in reading mode (public/private)
    Restriction  
    Support
    displays informations about the web site
    Suppression
    servlet that handle a paragraph's deletion
    WriteParagraph
    Servlet that manage the insertion of a new paragraph
